pages.text: The $(major)Meaty$(0) Gene allows the entity to be $(minor)Sheared for a Raw Porkchop$(0). If a player has it, they can $(minor)shear themselves$(0) by sneak right-clicking with Shears.$(br2)This has a configurable cooldown, with the default being 1 minute.$(br2)This can be mutated into Meaty 2, which causes the entity to spawn a Cooked Porkchop once every 5 minutes.
This Gene $(minor)can be given to mobs$(0).$(br2)By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br2)• Pig$(br)• Zombified Pigling$(br)• Piglin$(br)• Hoglin
